sub_title: Chief Creative Officer Vlisco Group / Executive Board Member Vlisco Group
summary:
Experienced international brand and creative turn around leader with active roles across all aspects of business and strategy within multicultural environments and multi-site teams in changing and challenging environments. 
Building, inspiring and encouraging diverse teams to think bold, big and brave in order to achieve creative excellence and a force for change. 
Analysing and defining a brand’s core principles and handwriting while delivering content across all the group’s portfolio, product ranges and consumer touchpoints. 
Understanding consumer behaviour and trends in complex markets and translating them into insights, products and compelling brand stories that increase the value of an organization. 

MOTIVATION
A creative entrepreneur who leads in:
-	Understanding cultural diversity and DNA and its translation into design language
-	The search for creative value to generate fresh and unexpected opportunities for growth
-	Starting ventures from scratch 
-	The renewal of heritage 
-	The building, management and leadership of a creative team 
-	The delivery of the highest quality standards
